mapper.sql: id, full_name, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, create_by, create_time, edit_by, edit_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time, address
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue(id, full_name, appellation, owner, company, job, email, phone, website, mphone, state, source, create_by, create_time, description, contact_summary, next_contact_time, address) values (#{id},#{ fullName},#{ appellation},#{ owner},#{ company},#{ job},#{ email},#{ phone},#{ website},#{ mphone},#{ state},#{source},#{ createBy},#{createTime},#{ description},#{ contactSummary},#{nextContactTime},#{ address})
mapper.select: select c.id,c.full_name,dv1.value as appellation,u1.name as owner,c.company,c.job,c.email,c.phone,c.website,c.mphone,dv2.value as state, dv3.value as source,u2.name as create_by,c.create_time,u3.name as edit_by,c.edit_time,c.description,c.contact_summary,c.next_contact_time,c.address from tbl_clue c left join tbl_dic_value dv1 on c.appellation=dv1.id join tbl_user u1 on c.owner=u1.id left join tbl_dic_value dv2 on c.state=dv2.id left join tbl_dic_value dv3 on c.source=dv3.id join tbl_user u2 on c.create_by=u2.id left join tbl_user u3 on c.edit_by=u3.id where c.id=#{id}
